thread.title: Reward offered in case of missing CDC doctor

title: Reward offered in case of missing CDC doctor
text:
Reward offered in case of missing CDC doctor 9:08am EST - 01:03 
A $10,000 reward is being offered for information on the disappearance of a Harvard educated doctor who works for the Centers for Disease Control. Linda So reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A $10,000 reward is being offered for information on the disappearance of a Harvard educated doctor who works for the Centers for Disease Control. Linda So reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EWUDPq
